sidebar.uniprot_id_help: Enter a valid UniProt ID (e.g., P0DTC2 for SARS-CoV-2 Spike)
sidebar.mutation_list_help: Enter mutations in A123T format, separated by commas or spaces
sidebar.calculate_sensitivity_help: Calculate mean sensitivity for all non-wildtype amino acids
sidebar.about_content:
Protein Site Explainer analyzes mutations using:
- ESM-2 language model for LLR calculation
- AlphaFold for structural confidence (pLDDT)
- UniProt features mapping
- 3D structure visualization with py3Dmol

main.enter_uniprot_id: Please enter a valid UniProt ID
main.enter_mutations: Please enter at least one mutation
main.plddt_not_available: AlphaFold pLDDT data not available for this protein
main.structure_not_available: 3D structure visualization not available for this protein
main.alphafold_data_not_available: AlphaFold structure data not available for UniProt ID {id}
main.results_without_alphafold: Results without AlphaFold data still include ESM scores and UniProt features
main.alphafold_not_found: AlphaFold structure not found for UniProt ID: {id}
main.enable_debug_suggestion: Enable debug mode above for more information about the error
main.alphaFold_404: AlphaFold DB currently has no entry for {id} (API 404).
main.local_file_option: You can provide a local AlphaFold structure file in the models directory or set the ALPHAFOLD_LOCAL_DIR environment variable. Supported file formats: AF-{uniprot_id}-F1-model_v*.pdb/cif (including gzip compressed files).
main.kaleido_missing_hint: Kaleido is required for PNG export. Please install it with 'pip install kaleido'.
